T.query: select s.stat_id from instances i left join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id

F.query: select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id
select s.stat_id from instances i left join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.idx_scan
select s.stat_id from instances i left join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id and i.instance_id = s.idx_scan
select s.stat_id from instances i join index_stats s on i.instance_id = s.instance_id and i.instance_id = s.idx_scan
